cta.title: Ready to discover your perfect fragrance?
cta.body: Answer a few simple questions about fragrances you love, ones you dislike, and any sensitivities you have‚Äîand let Ask Seba do the rest.

hero.title: Our Story at Ask Seba
hero.subtitle: An app that analyzes fragrance compatibility based on your personal preferences

sections.title: Why Ask Seba?
body: Our journey began with those elegant bottles lined up on the shelves, covered in dust despite their hefty price tags.

We discovered that buying a fragrance based on a quick store experience is a real gamble. We don't suggest random perfumes; we engineer olfactory compatibility by connecting your personal preferences with a database of thousands of global fragrances under IFRA safety standards.

sections.title: Traditional Fragrance Problems
bullets: Random selection: Buying based on a quick store experience or generic recommendations that don't consider your unique olfactory profile
Sensitivity: Hidden ingredients that may cause headaches or skin irritation hours after use
Incompatibility: The fragrance simply doesn't suit your body chemistry or personality, leading to wasted money and abandoned bottles

sections.title: Olfactory Compatibility Engineering
body: We don't suggest random perfumes; we engineer olfactory compatibility
By linking your personal preferences with a database of thousands of global fragrances under IFRA safety standards, we analyze every note from top to base

sections.title: How does ask.seba work?
bullets: üéØ Phase 1 - We understand your olfactory profile: A smart 3-minute quiz that reveals loved notes, fragrance families, past symptoms, and restricted ingredients
üî¨ Phase 2 - Precise scientific analysis: We use Fragrantica, IFRA, and global safety standards with daily updates
üé® Phase 3 - Smart matching: Our algorithm analyzes each fragrance based on note compatibility + allergy avoidance + lifestyle fit

testimonials.quote: I had 7 bottles I never used. After ask.seba, every fragrance I buy now I use down to the last drop!
testimonials.author: Ahmed

testimonials.quote: I discovered the problem wasn't my skin, but the synthetic musk note that was in all my previous fragrances.
testimonials.author: Noura

testimonials.quote: It saved me thousands of riyals. Now I buy with full confidence.
testimonials.author: Khalid

values.title: üî¨ Scientific accuracy, not guesswork
values.description: We build our knowledge base on global fragrance sources and international safety standards. We don't rely on opinions or trends, but on precise analysis of chemical composition

values.title: üí∞ Protecting your investment
values.description: We consider fragrance an investment in your presence, not just a random purchase. Every recommendation is designed to ensure you use the fragrance to the last drop

values.title: üß¨ 100% tailored to your olfactory profile

values.title: üåç Living database

values.title: Fully integrated Arabic interface

cta.title: Your journey begins now
cta.body: No more guessing. No more regret. No more abandoned bottles. Your perfect fragrance awaits. Your smart advisor is ready.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: ask.seba is your smart fragrance advisor. We help you discover the perfect fragrance that suits your taste, skin, and daily life‚Äîbefore you buy it. Through a smart quiz (just 3 minutes with 4 simple questions), we analyze your preferences and match them with over 50,000 global fragrances, ensuring you get: ‚úÖ A fragrance containing the notes you love, ‚úÖ Completely free of ingredients that may irritate you or cause allergies, ‚úÖ Suitable for your climate and occasions. üí° Tip: Try the quiz from your phone while at the store to compare results on the spot!

questions.question: What are the prices and available plans?
questions.answer: Free plan: ‚úÖ Full free quiz, ‚úÖ 3-5 fragrance recommendations with high compatibility scores (80%+), ‚úÖ View details for each fragrance (notes, compatibility percentage, price comparison). Premium plan (optional): ‚úÖ Unlimited quizzes, ‚úÖ 8-12 recommendations categorized by occasion (daily/work, evening/events, winter, summer/light), ‚úÖ 2-3 alternatives per category, ‚úÖ Save your quiz history and favorites, ‚úÖ Faster technical support. üí° Note: You can cancel your subscription at any time with no obligations!

questions.question: Does it work on mobile?
questions.answer: ‚úÖ Yes, absolutely! ask.seba is designed to run smoothly on: üì± Smartphones (iOS & Android), üíª Laptops and desktops, üñ•Ô∏è Tablets. The interface is fully responsive and optimized for small screens, with full Arabic language support (RTL).

questions.question: How does the app handle allergies?
questions.answer: ‚úÖ We specialize in this! We use international fragrance databases and IFRA global standards to pinpoint the exact triggering note. Practical example: If you're sensitive to synthetic oud, we automatically exclude all fragrances containing it. But we may suggest fragrances with 100% natural oud wood if they're safe for you. How do we analyze your sensitivity? Note type (natural vs. synthetic), precise chemical components, potential reactions with your skin. ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: If you develop a new severe allergy, consult a dermatologist first!

questions.question: How does ask.seba calculate the compatibility score?
questions.answer: We analyze 3 main factors to calculate the compatibility score with high accuracy: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Note compatibility (40%): How many of your loved notes are in the fragrance? Do the main notes (Heart & Base) match your taste? 2Ô∏è‚É£ Health safety (40%): Is the fragrance completely free of your personal allergens? Does it comply with IFRA safety standards? 3Ô∏è‚É£ Lifestyle fit (20%): Does it suit your region's climate? Is it appropriate for the occasions you specified (daily, evening, formal...)? Why might the score be 87% and not 100%? A 100% score means perfect match in everything, which is very rare. Because we're honest with you! üí° Tip: Any fragrance at 85%+ is an excellent choice!

questions.question: Can my sensitivities change over time?
questions.answer: ‚úÖ Yes, absolutely! Sensitivities may: üìà Develop: A new allergy appears that wasn't there before, üìâ Subside: An old allergy disappears with treatment or lifestyle changes, üîÑ Change: Become less or more severe. üí° Solution: You can retake the quiz periodically or when buying a new fragrance or checking one you own.

questions.question: Are the results really accurate?
questions.answer: 95%+ success rate based on: üî¨ Scientific sources: The world's largest fragrance databases (50,000+ fragrances), IFRA: The global organization for fragrance safety standards, Daily updates from trusted sources. üë• Real user experience: Thousands of positive reviews, Ongoing monitoring of customer satisfaction, Algorithm improvements based on feedback. ‚ö†Ô∏è But remember: Every skin is unique, and results may vary slightly. Test a small sample first before buying the full bottle. Personal experience is the final judge!

questions.question: Do I need to register?
questions.answer: ‚ùå No, registration is completely optional! For guests (without registration): ‚úÖ Use the full quiz, ‚úÖ See results immediately, ‚úÖ Save results temporarily on your device. For registered users (free): ‚úÖ Everything above + üìä Save your previous results, ‚≠ê Create a favorites list, üìà Track your quiz history, üéØ Improved recommendations over time, üì± Share your results with friends via direct link, WhatsApp, or Twitter. ‚ö†Ô∏è Privacy note: When sharing, your friend only sees fragrance recommendations‚Äînot your sensitivity data or personal details.

questions.question: How do you protect my privacy and data?
questions.answer: ‚úÖ Military-grade security for your data! What we protect: üîê AES-256 encryption for all data, üîí Mandatory HTTPS (SSL/TLS 1.3), üö´ No selling, no sharing, no use for advertising, üóëÔ∏è Immediate and permanent deletion upon request. What we collect (for registered users only): Email (for login), fragrance preferences, quiz history. What we never collect: ‚ùå Your phone number, ‚ùå Your address, ‚ùå Sensitive payment info, ‚ùå Your precise location. üìÑ For full details: Privacy policy

questions.question: What fragrances are supported in the app?
questions.answer: Included fragrances: ‚úÖ We cover global, Arab, and Eastern fragrances registered in international databases. Important requirement‚Äîthe fragrance must be: ‚úÖ Documented in Fragrantica or IFRA, ‚úÖ Have a clear composition (notes known), ‚úÖ Available in the market. Unsupported fragrances: ‚ùå Locally produced fragrances not internationally documented, ‚ùå Personal blends without clear composition, ‚ùå Counterfeit fragrances (Fake/Replica).

questions.question: What if I can't find my favorite fragrance?
questions.answer: Several possibilities: 1Ô∏è‚É£ The fragrance exists but with lower compatibility: It may be outside the main results due to compatibility below 80%. 2Ô∏è‚É£ The fragrance isn't in the database: It may be very local or exclusive‚Äîemail us at support@askseba.com and we'll add it! 3Ô∏è‚É£ Your preferences have changed: Maybe what you loved before isn't right for you now‚Äîtry the new recommendations, you might discover something better!

questions.question: Does ask.seba sell fragrances?
questions.answer: ‚ùå No, we don't sell fragrances! We only: üîç Help you discover the right fragrance, üìä Show you details for each fragrance (notes, approximate price), üó∫Ô∏è Guide you to trusted places to buy (stores, websites). Why? ‚úÖ We maintain our neutrality and independence, ‚úÖ We're not influenced by commissions or commercial deals, ‚úÖ Our recommendations are 100% for your benefit only.

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: Several easy ways: üìß For general inquiries: Email: support@askseba.com, ‚è±Ô∏è We typically respond within 24 hours, üí¨ Support form: On the Profile page ‚Üí Contact us. üêõ Have a technical issue? Do the following: 1. Take a screenshot of the problem, 2. Explain the issue in detail (what were you doing? what happened? what device and browser?), 3. Email us at support@askseba.com with subject: Technical issue.

questions.question: Have a suggestion to improve the app?
questions.answer: We love new ideas! üöÄ Share your suggestion via: üìß Email: support@askseba.com, üìù Email subject: Improvement suggestion, üí¨ Suggestions page in the app. What we're looking for: New features you'd like to see, Interface improvements, Fragrances or brands you'd like added, Anything that makes your experience better! üéØ We promise: Careful review of every suggestion, Response within 48 hours, Implementing the most requested ideas.

sections.title: Data We Collect
content: For guests (without registration): We don't collect any data at all. The quiz runs locally in your browser (local storage) and results are temporary‚Äînot sent to our servers.
For registered users: We only collect email (for login), name (optional), fragrance preferences (loved notes, personal sensitivities), quiz history (to save your results).
What we never collect: ‚ùå Your home address or phone number, ‚ùå Financial data (payment via secure processors outside our system), ‚ùå Your precise location, ‚ùå Sensitive health data

sections.title: 2. How do we use your data?
content: We use it exclusively for: Custom fragrance recommendations that match your notes and avoid your sensitivities, Saving your history and favorites across devices, Improving the algorithm (anonymized aggregate data), General statistics (e.g., most popular note: oud).
We never use it for: Targeted advertising, selling to third parties, or off-site tracking.

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing
content: We don't share your personal data with any commercial entity. The only exceptions:

GDPR-bound technical partners: Payment processors (PCI-compliant payment processing), Databases (protected database), Authentication (secure, encrypted login). All partners are bound by GDPR + Saudi PDPL standards and cannot use your data for other purposes.
Legal cases only: Formal request from Saudi authorities with a court order, Your explicit consent (e.g., sharing a result on Twitter)

sections.title: 4. Your Legal Rights
content: You have full right to:
Access: Get a copy of all your data (JSON file) from dashboard ‚Üí Download my data
Rectification: Update your preferences or sensitivities anytime from account settings
Immediate deletion: Delete your account entirely from dashboard ‚Üí Delete account (data is permanently removed within 30 days)
Objection: Stop use of your data for statistics
Portability: Transfer your data in a readable format
Contact: support@askseba.com with subject: Privacy request

sections.title: 5. Security & Encryption
content: We protect your data with the highest technical standards:
üîê AES-256 encryption for all stored data
üîí Mandatory HTTPS with SSL/TLS 1.3 for all connections
üîç Monthly security audits by independent experts
üíæ Encrypted daily backups
üö® Immediate notification (within 72 hours) in case of any security breach

sections.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
content: We will update this policy when necessary (technical updates or new regulations).
When we update: Notification on the privacy policy page, Updated last modified date, Summary of key changes in dashboard.
Your continued use of Ask Seba after the update means you agree to the new policy. You can delete your account at any time if you disagree.

sections.title: 7. Contact Us
content: Questions about your privacy?
üìß support@askseba.com
‚è±Ô∏è We typically respond within 24-48 hours
We don't retain support correspondence for more than 90 days

compliance.title: Fully compliant with
compliance.note: This policy protects you and us legally. Your privacy is never for sale.
